Name: DREMA
About the game: DREMA is first-person quest, guides you through a series of unique locations, each with a story to tell. Escape an abandoned gas station, walk through a snow-covered forest, stroll through a gloomy amusement park and try to become a member of the crew of a spaceship. Explore the detailed levels and try to solve the riddle of each story. Is everything as obvious as it seems?
